1 #include "masterslave/manipulation/VisualServoing.h"

3 VisualServoing::VisualServoing(ros::NodeHandle &nh): nh_(nh)
4 {
5  differenceTransform = Eigen::Affine3d::Identity();
6  differenceTransformOld = Eigen::Affine3d::Identity();
7  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<masterslave::VisualServoingConfig> server;
8  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<masterslave::VisualServoingConfig>::CallbackType f;
9  f = boost::bind(&VisualServoing::configurationCallback,this ,_1,_2);
10  server.setCallback(f);
11  markerSub = nh_.subscribe("/ar_pose_marker",1,&VisualServoing::markerCallback,this);
12  visualServoingServer = nh_.advertiseService("/Manipulation",&VisualServoing::visualServoingCallback,this);
13  ros::spin();
14 }
15 
16 Eigen::Vector3d VisualServoing::calculateTranslationalPID()
17 {
18  Eigen::Vector3d retValue = Eigen::Vector3d::Zero();
19  integralErrorTrans = iTrans*differenceTransform.translation()*cycleTime;
20  retValue = pTrans*differenceTransform.translation() + dTrans*(differenceTransform.translation()-differenceTransformOld.translation())/cycleTime + integralErrorTrans;
21  ROS_INFO_STREAM(retValue);
22  return retValue;
23 }
24 
25 Eigen::Matrix3d VisualServoing::calculateRotationalPID()
26 {
27  Eigen::Quaterniond temp;
28  Eigen::Quaterniond acutalRotation(actualTransform.rotation());
29  Eigen::Quaterniond inititialRotaion(initialTransform.rotation());
30  temp = acutalRotation.slerp(pRot*cycleTime,inititialRotaion);
31  ROS_INFO_STREAM(temp.toRotationMatrix());
32  return temp.toRotationMatrix();
33 }
34 
35 bool VisualServoing::visualServoingCallback(masterslave::Manipulation::Request &req, masterslave::Manipulation::Response &resp)
36 {
37  Eigen::Affine3d T_0_EE_old;
38  Eigen::Affine3d T_0_EE_new = Eigen::Affine3d::Identity();
39  tf::poseMsgToEigen(req.T_0_EE_old,T_0_EE_old);
40  T_0_EE_new.translate(T_0_EE_old.translation()-0.1*calculateTranslationalPID());
41  T_0_EE_new.rotate(T_0_EE_old.rotation());
42  ROS_WARN_STREAM(T_0_EE_old.matrix());
43  ROS_WARN_STREAM(T_0_EE_new.matrix());
44  tf::poseEigenToMsg(T_0_EE_new,resp.T_0_EE_new);
45  return true;
46 
47 }
48 
49 void VisualServoing::markerCallback(const ar_track_alvar_msgs::AlvarMarkersConstPtr& markerPtr)
50 {
51  int markerFound = 0;
52  Eigen::Affine3d tcp;
53  Eigen::Affine3d obj;
54  differenceTransformOld = differenceTransform;
55  differenceTransform = Eigen::Affine3d::Identity();
56  for(int i=0; i< markerPtr->markers.size(); i++)
57  {
58  switch(markerPtr->markers[i].id)
59  {
60  case 0:
61  tf::poseMsgToEigen(markerPtr->markers[i].pose.pose,tcp);
62  markerFound += 1;
63  break;
64  case 1:
65  tf::poseMsgToEigen(markerPtr->markers[i].pose.pose,obj);
66  markerFound += 1 << 1;
67  break;
68  }
69  }
70  if(markerFound+1 >> 2 == 1)
71  {
72  actualTransform = obj*tcp.inverse();
73  if(initialRun)
74  {
75  initialTransform = actualTransform;
76  initialRun = false;
77  }
78  differenceTransform = actualTransform*initialTransform.inverse();
79  ROS_WARN_STREAM(differenceTransform.matrix());
80  }
81 }
82 
83 void VisualServoing::configurationCallback(masterslave::VisualServoingConfig &config, uint32_t level)
84 {
85  pRot = config.PRot;
86  dRot = config.DRot;
87  iRot = config.IRot;
88 
89  pTrans = config.PTrans;
90  dTrans = config.DTrans;
91  iTrans = config.ITrans;
92 
93 }
